ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believed] وَعَمِلُوا۟ [and did] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ [good deeds] سَيَجْعَلُ [will bestow] لَهُمُ [for them] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] وُدًّۭا [affection]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati sayajAAalu lahumu arrahmanuwudda

ayahs.textUthmani: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَإِنَّمَا [So, only] يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ [We (have) made it easy] بِلِسَانِكَ [in your tongue] لِتُبَشِّرَ [that you may give glad tidings] بِهِ [with it] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [(to) the righteous] وَتُنذِرَ [and warn] بِهِۦ [with it] قَوْمًۭا [a people] لُّدًّۭا [hostile]
ayahs.transliteration: Fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanikalitubashshira bihi almuttaqeena watunthira bihi qawmanludda

words.translation: that you may give glad tidings

ayahs.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًۢا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We (have) destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation] هَلْ [Can] تُحِسُّ [you perceive] مِنْهُم [of them] مِّنْ [any] أَحَدٍ [one] أَوْ [or] تَسْمَعُ [hear] لَهُمْ [from them] رِكْزًۢا [a sound]
ayahs.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin haltuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasmaAAu lahum rikza

ayahs.wordByWord: مَآ [Not] أَنزَلْنَا [We (have) sent down] عَلَيْكَ [to you] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] لِتَشْقَىٰٓ [that you be distressed]
إِلَّا [(But)] تَذْكِرَةًۭ [(as) a reminder] لِّمَن [for (those) who] يَخْشَىٰ [fear]

ayahs.textUthmani: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى
ayahs.wordByWord: تَنزِيلًۭا [A revelation] مِّمَّنْ [from (He) Who] خَلَقَ [created] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [and the heavens] ٱلْعُلَى [[the] high]
ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [The Most Gracious] عَلَى [over] ٱلْعَرْشِ [the Throne] ٱسْتَوَىٰ [is established]

ayahs.textUthmani: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحْتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَهُۥ [To Him (belongs)] مَا [whatever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَمَا [and whatever] فِى [(is) in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between them] وَمَا [and whatever] تَحْتَ [(is) under] ٱلثَّرَىٰ [the soil]
ayahs.transliteration: Lahu ma fee assamawatiwama fee al-ardi wama baynahuma wamatahta aththara

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِن تَجْهَرْ بِٱلْقَوْلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخْفَى
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِن [And if] تَجْهَرْ [you speak aloud] بِٱلْقَوْلِ [the word] فَإِنَّهُۥ [then indeed, He] يَعْلَمُ [knows] ٱلسِّرَّ [the secret] وَأَخْفَى [and the more hidden]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-in tajhar bilqawli fa-innahuyaAAlamu assirra waakhfa

ayahs.textUthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: ٱللَّهُ [Allah ] لَآ [(there is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ ۖ [Him] لَهُ [To Him (belong)] ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ [the Names] ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ [the Most Beautiful]
ayahs.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa lahu al-asmao alhusna

ayahs.wordByWord: وَهَلْ [And has] أَتَىٰكَ [come to you] حَدِيثُ [the narration] مُوسَىٰٓ [(of) Musa]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِذْ رَءَا نَارًا فَقَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوْ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدًى
ayahs.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] رَءَا [he saw] نَارًۭا [a fire] فَقَالَ [then he said] لِأَهْلِهِ [to his family] ٱمْكُثُوٓا۟ [Stay here] إِنِّىٓ [indeed, I] ءَانَسْتُ [[I] perceived] نَارًۭا [a fire] لَّعَلِّىٓ [perhaps I (can)] ءَاتِيكُم [bring you] مِّنْهَا [therefrom] بِقَبَسٍ [a burning brand] أَوْ [or] أَجِدُ [I find] عَلَى [at] ٱلنَّارِ [the fire] هُدًۭى [guidance]
ayahs.transliteration: Ith raa naran faqalali-ahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran laAAallee ateekumminha biqabasin aw ajidu AAala annarihuda

ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَمَّآ [Then when] أَتَىٰهَا [he came to it] نُودِىَ [he was called] يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ [O Musa]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنِّىٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخْلَعْ نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, [I]] أَنَا۠ [I Am] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] فَٱخْلَعْ [so remove] نَعْلَيْكَ ۖ [your shoes] إِنَّكَ [Indeed, you] بِٱلْوَادِ [(are) in the valley] ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ [the sacred] طُوًۭى [(of) Tuwa]
ayahs.transliteration: Innee ana rabbuka fakhlaAAnaAAlayka innaka bilwadi almuqaddasi tuwa
